column1: 577555adae6a115c29f2a8a8#An explanation on data required for regular client requests for step 1 of the wizard.#Enter the number of undergraduate and/or graduate students.  We use this to determine the number of user ids.  We will give you a few extra as well.#CLIENT_REQUESTS#REGULAR_NUMBER_OF_STUDENTS

577555c8ae6a115c29f2a8a9#Help for step 2 of the wizard#Click the products on the left list to add them to your request. You can remove them from your request by clicking the products on the right list.  You can select up to REQUEST_LIMIT products.#CLIENT_REQUESTS#SELECT_PRODUCT_WELL
577555e9ae6a115c29f2a8aa#Help for step 3 of the wizard.#Enter any additional instructions that will help us fulfill your request.#CLIENT_REQUESTS#CLIENT_REQUESTS_COMMENTS
57755604ae6a115c29f2a8ab#Help for step 4 of the wizard#Enter the dates you will require each product.  If you don't need every product at the beginning of the term
column2:
choose a date a week before you will need it. Keep in mind that it helps us to balance our load if requests are spread out.

Review your information and click Complete to save your request#CLIENT_REQUESTS#CLIENT_REQUESTS_SUMMARY

column1:
5775562fae6a115c29f2a8ac#Describes existing request#"

You have an existing request created on DATECREATED

You can add products
column2:
change start and ending dates or edit the comment.  However you cannot change a product that has already been assigned.

column1: 57755649ae6a115c29f2a8ad##You can add students
column2: change dates or enter comments on this page.  If you wnat to add products
column3: use the wizard on the Create Request page.#CLIENT_REQUESTS#VIEW_REQUEST_MESSAGE

column1:
5798e197efd78278362f574c#Description of sandbox clients#

Faculty Development Clients

These clients are useful if you want to practice and will not use the client in a class. If you will be using this client in a class this session
column2:
choose a regular client. The clients are issued from a shared system used specifically for development clients. The advantage is that they do not count against the client quota specified in your EUA.

By default you will receive two user ids. If you need more
column3:
you enter a comment on step 3 of the wizard.

#CLIENT_REQUESTS#SANDBOX_MESSAGE

column1: 58a4ab94078e5ed4396edd3c#Issues with curriculum exercises message#<ol><li>Select the product request from the table below.  If the table doesn't appear
column2:
you have no active client requests.

  • Fill inthe information about the curriculum. Complete as many fields as possible.

  • Enter a description of the problem. Be as specific as possible and inlcude the steps that led up to the issue.

  • Attach files that include any relevant information such as screenshots of error messages.  To attach files
